questions.clue: This Jamaican sprinter holds the world record for the 100 meters, set at the 2009 World Championships.
In 1992, this American basketball team, known for its NBA superstars, won gold in Barcelona.
This Chinese gymnast became a legend in 1984 by winning an impressive 6 medals, including 3 gold.
Winning 8 gold medals in a single Games, this swimmer broke the previous record set by Mark Spitz in 1972.
In 1936, this athlete won 4 gold medals in athletics, challenging Hitler's notions of Aryan supremacy.
This panel in the Unity Editor shows a hierarchical list of all GameObjects in the scene. It's your go-to for organizing your scene.
To track and control different groupings of GameObjects in gameplay, this Unity component is essential for creating basketball games.
For non-Chinese speakers, translating this scripting interface documentation is crucial when scripting interactions in Unity for projects targeting Chinese audiences.
In the Unity Editor, the lighting setting that allows real-time lights to illuminate your football field accurately is known by this sunny term.
Mastering this Unity Editor feature that automatically calculates the motion of a player’s jersey is key for realistic animations in sports games.
This dynasty, famous for its terracotta soldiers, unified China and standardized script during its reign.
The Yuan Dynasty, established by this group, was founded by Kublai Khan.
During the Ming Dynasty, this explorer's vast fleet established China's maritime power in the early 15th century.
Known for its art, literature, and porcelain, this dynasty also saw the start of the Opium Wars with Britain.
Among various achievements, this ancient Zhou Dynasty saw the formation of the Mandate of Heaven concept to justify its rule.
This Asian-American NBA player was known for sparking 'Linsanity' with the New York Knicks in 2012.
Steve Chen, an Asian-American, co-founded this popular video-sharing platform in 2005, later acquired by Google.
This actress became the first Asian-American woman to win a Golden Globe for Best Actress in a TV Comedy or Musical, in 2019 for her role in 'The Farewell'.
Chinese-American architect I.M. Pei is celebrated for designing this iconic addition to the Louvre Museum in Paris.
Created by Unity Technologies, the game development platform Unity has seen leadership from Asian-American figures, including this 2023 CEO.
This man, known for his love of basketball, developed the iPod and co-founded Apple.
Named after a small, mythical horse, this engine from Unity Technologies is widely used in game development.
This Chinese tech entrepreneur co-founded Alibaba and is known for his interest in education.
A household name in computing, Windows was invented under his leadership in 1985.
This foldable pocket calculator from Japan, released in 1970, was a technological marvel.

final.clue: Developed in the Unity engine, this online sports video game features a global player base and includes roles such as Marksman, dedicated to striking from a distance. Released by a company headquartered in China, it has grown to be one of the most popular esports titles.
